buildCommand: curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/phpbrew/phpbrew/master/phpbrew.sh  | bash && phpbrew switch 8.2 && php -r "copy('https://getcomposer.org/installer',  'composer-setup.php');" && php composer-setup.php --install-dir=. --filename=composer && php composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader
